reviewText: It Remind Me Of Real Steam Engines, Real Diesel Engines, Real Electric Engines, Real Railway Coaches, Real Railway Trucks & Real Railways

Probably my 2 year old son's favorite Thomas collection, trains and fire trucks!
If your child or grandchild loves trains in general and Thomas in particular, this is enjoyable fair for them.  My grandson never lost interest while watching.
My son's adore this series. They never get tired of it and I love the manners it helps to teach.
My just turned 2 yr old grandson asks to watch this everyday.  I let him once one of the stories at a time.  There are several, each with positive messages.

My son loves Firefighter Flynn and this is the only collection I've found so far that has an episode with him in it. As always I find the lessons taught are good ones for young children to learn in a fun and understandable way.

This is the first of the recent series of modern animation movies, followed by Blue Mountain Mystery, Day of the Diesels, King of the Railway.  Just a great hour of fun, introduces the new character Hiro.
My toddler (4 1/2) loves Thomas & Friends, and this episode(s) of rescues will not disappoint your child.  Highly recommend to any Thomas fan.
Our son adores the Rescue Rails Thomas the Train. He watches one Thomas before bed almost every night, and this is the most requested one.
Thought this movie would be a great addition to his Thomas movies. He liked it but has only watched it once. Maybe in time he will be interested in it but doesn't seem to be right now.
The episodes are here are just like the ones on PBS which my son loves. The intermission between episodes is boring though. Wish they would have done songs instead.

This is not one of the "feature length" movies like Blue Mountain Mystery or Day of the Diesels.  However, each Thomas episode within the video is fully CGI.

The bits with Mr. Perkins in the Engine Drivers' Common Room in between each Thomas episode are live action.  My son used to be disappointed to see Mr. Perkins interrupting Thomas, but Mr. Perkins has been growing on him as my son gets older.
My son loves this show so much that he'll play with his Thomas trains as the show is going on.
Would not play. Kept saying title is unavailable after a couple of minutes of play. Please fix this issue. Thanks
He said it was his favorite  He memorizes every Thomas story and repeats it to you verbatim.  Thomas stories teach by encouraging fair play.
I sat and watched this with my 20 month old Great Grand-daughter as she loves Thomas.  We both enjoyed it! Very Entertaining.
Great movie as always teaches caring for others and responsibility, and its fun to watch and see their eyes light up at each engine.
My little boy is a huge thomas fan.  He really loved this movie.  It was exciting and kept him entertained.
this product Came timely mannear. It is to be Christmas gift I know my son will get a lot of use out of it.
My daughter loves Thomas and enjoyed this movie.  It features stories about Flynn, James, Edward, Bertie and Thomas.  Worth watching.
Combining Thomas the Tank Engine and Rescue vehicles?! It's a win win in my house.  Love the character Flynn. And I guess I need more words in this review so that is why I wrote this last sentence.
This is a great set of stories, but the breaks are done with a boring string of appearances in the train drivers common room with an actor that turns out to be boring
My grandsons are 2 and 5 and love Thomas, fun movie, good music, kept them interested start to finish looking forward to more  new movies
Very good collection of Thomas for the kids. I am always happy with anything Thomas. I recommend this to rent.

My three year old son adores Thomas, but is currently fixated on "firefighter Flynn!" He happily asks for this one by name and loves watching Flynn rush off to save the engines. A great addition to any Thomas library.
The kids loved this and have seen it over and over. A must see show for kids of all ages
My grandson just loves watching Thomas and friends. He is 22 months and has been watching Thomas for a while. Thomas keeps his interest and very entertaining.
My kids really love Thomas and this was fun for them to watch. Great lessons and fun learning about really useful engines!

My grandchildren love Thomas The Tank Engine.  It is currently their favorite.  Nice for a wind down close to bedtime.
Good stories around Flyn and Belle, my son loves it and acts out the stories on his wooden railway. Good stuff!
Our son loves trains & firetrucks, so naturally this was a good choice.  This is one of the few good kids shows I allow my son to watch.
My son loved this!! He was  amazed with the clarity & how it was just like 'regular movies'. Two thumbs up.
Great Stories, this one keeps my 3 year old entertained.  He loves it, and always wants to watch it. Great buy
Rescue On Rails kept our boys quiet and entertained at the doctors office. Now they request this one over and over!

My grandson will sit very quietly and then burst into excitement with this video.  He loves that Thomas and his friends are doing what he wants to do when he grows up - rescue folks from danger.  I love this video!

I'll be honest. I've seen so many Thomas movies/shows, my eyes glaze over whenever one is on. Because of that, I'm not sure I can give a fair, unbiased review, so... I turned to my 4-year-old son for his opinion.

Me: Hey, [insert my 4yo son's name here].

Son: Yeah?

Me: How many stars would you give "Thomas & Friends: Rescue On Rails."

Son: 40.

There you go. Forty stars.

Enjoy.

The DVD of Thomas : Rescue on the Rails, arrived on time and in excellent condition. This will be a great addition to the collection of DVDs for my Grand Daughter, who is a big fan of thomas the Train engine.
What little boy doesn't love Thomas?!!  :)  These shows are great!  Defiinitely reccomend for the little guy who loves trains!
An okay collection of Thomas stories.  Only four and the best one is James to the Rescue.
The best if both worlds for my 5 year old who loves trains and fire trucks.
